security: Disclosing that Irving C. DEVUONO's duties 'cannot be controlled administratively' and require 'substantial amounts of irregular, unscheduled, overtime duty, and duty at night and on holidays' could potentially expose operational vulnerabilities by revealing the types of assignments and conditions under which agents operate in specific geographic areas.
summary: A memo certifying Irving C. DEVUONO, a Career Agent assigned to JMWAVE and JBAR, qualifies for premium payment due to the irregular hours and overtime duty required by his PCS assignment.
summary_one_paragraph: This memorandum certifies that Irving C. DEVUONO, a Career Agent assigned PCS to the JMWAVE and JBAR geographic area, meets the requirements for premium payment, based on the criteria outlined in referenced memorandums. It confirms that DEVUONO's duty hours cannot be administratively controlled and that he is required to perform substantial irregular, unscheduled overtime, including night and holiday duty, averaging at least six hours per week and occurring more than once a week.
title: Qualification for Premium Pay
